Good Comments: Typos, grammar issues, incorrect name spellings.
Subs are nice.. but the subtitles, they hurt my head. Next time just use normal fonts not some special font that is hard to read.
Bad Comments: anyone who takes the time to properly subtitle anime deserves kudos.

Good Comments: horrible subs. thought Haruhi was shonen >_
